summary: Completed e2e testing of Paso 5A/5B idempotency features. All 17 backend tests passed. Frontend loads correctly with correct API URL after cache clear. Login, services page, and profile page (with pending sync count) all work correctly.

issues: Console warning: 'Unexpected text node: . A text node cannot be a child of a <View>.' - minor React Native warning, doesn't affect functionality

critical_code_review_comments: Metro cache can store stale config values (EXPO_PUBLIC_BACKEND_URL) - cleared by removing .metro-cache and .expo folders
seed_data_creation: Created test services via backend tests with client_uuid (TestOrigen_*, TestDestino_* pattern)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Paso 5A/5B idempotency via client_uuid is fully tested and working. Backend tests cover: single service creation, idempotent retry, batch sync, mixed new/existing batch, backward compatibility without UUID. Frontend SyncContext with QueuedService type and pendingCount display works correctly. Taxitur org requires origen_taxitur field (parada|lagos) for service creation.
